about_the_game:
synopsis

Welcome to Gehenna Sticks University, professor.

You can get a job at the prestigious Sticks University of Hell and graduate two students safely.

Instruct them in numerous ways, including overtime, vigil, verbal abuse, Rejek, etc.

No one will reject the professor's orders, but be careful.

Angry postgraduate demons will try to kill you...

the Member of people produced

  • Produced by Yujin Games

  • Illustration: Halla Tangerine

  • UI: Chibinho

Game specs

  • Genre: Visual Novel, Fostering, Strategy

  • Estimated play time: 4 hours~

  • Configuration

    • Two standing characters

    • 8 CG illustrations

    • 8 ending

How to play

Users can direct the work of two graduate students for a total of 30 weeks.

Users can make graduate students earn money or teach classes to raise statistics.

You can direct up to five tasks each week, and at the end of the tasks, a special event will be held that will increase your favorability.

Users can have a relationship through a special event with graduate students.

You can check the ending at the end of the 30th week or if you fill the graduate student's favorability to the maximum.

You can check eight different endings depending on the user's choice.

How to control game

  • Mouse Click: Line Progress

  • Ctrl: Skip the line

  • Enter : Line Progress

  • Esc : End of game, skip video

※ This work contains some shocking scenes or horror-inducing content. ※

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes the following elements.

eneral Mature Content :
Revealing outfits; sexual stimulation;

There are no depictions of sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm.

short_description: Take over as a professor of hell, and guide devil graduate students. Hello University, it's starting now!
